---
title: "Working Through Wavelength Ratios"
output:
  github_document: default
always_allow_html: true
---

```{r, echo=F, message=F, include=F}
devtools::load_all(".")
source('../code/plot.R')
c(60,63,72) %>% mami.codi()
```

```{r, echo=T}
chord = hrep::sparse_fr_spectrum(c(60,72), num_harmonics=11) %>% mami.codi(verbose=T)
```

```{r, echo=F}
chord %>% dplyr::select(consonance_dissonance, major_minor)
```

#### Frequency

```{r, echo=F}
chord$ratios_frequency[[1]] %>% dplyr::arrange(ratio)
```

```{r, echo=F}
min(chord$frequencies[[1]])
chord$consonance_frequency
```

#### Wavelength

```{r, echo=F}
chord$ratios_wavelength[[1]] %>% dplyr::arrange(dplyr::desc(ratio)) 
```

```{r, echo=F}
max(chord$frequencies[[1]])
chord$consonance_wavelength
```
